alert.note: Alert for Delta; Hopkins; Lamar (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 16 at 11:57AM CDT until July 16 at 12:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Hopkins County in north central Texas... Northern Delta County in north central Texas... Lamar County in north central Texas... * Until 1230 PM CDT. * At 1157 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Pattonville, or 9 miles southeast of Paris, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Paris, Sulphur Springs, Cooper, Blossom, Cooper Lake, Lake Sulphur Springs, Pat Mayse Lake, Lake Crook, Powderly, Big Creek Lake, Cooper Lake State Park, Pattonville, Arthur City, Camp Maxey, Lake Gibbons, Klondike, Deport, Pine Forest, Tira and Novice. This includes Interstate 30 between mile markers 113 and 141. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
